data.message: Set up Duro eval tracking system: Created eval_metrics skill (ops/eval_metrics.py) that computes decision review rate, unverified rate, reopen rate. Registered in skills index. Created weekly_eval_metrics checklist. Validated 3 Phase 1 Feedback Loop decisions. Current baseline: 60 real decisions, 50 unverified (after validations), 9 validated, 0% reopen rate.
data.task: Set up Duro eval tracking system
